n still free Oskar by pay to Brem. Talk to Oskar and his owner Brem, he will ask for 1000 gold for releasing Oskar. Pass a persuasion check of 15 can lower the price (600). After releasing Oskar talk to him to learn more about his story. You can pay an extra 200 for his trip to Baldur's Gate.
